solution_line_template: Since one-foot wire mesh is sold at ${cost_per_foot}, with ${total_money}, Melany can buy ${total_money}/${cost_per_foot} = <<{total_money}/{cost_per_foot}={feet_of_wire_mesh_bought}>>{feet_of_wire_mesh_bought} feet of wire mesh.

If Melany has to fence {field_length} feet of the field and has {feet_of_wire_mesh_bought} feet of wire mesh, she will not fence {field_length}-{feet_of_wire_mesh_bought} = <<{field_length}-{feet_of_wire_mesh_bought}={unfenced_length}>>{unfenced_length} feet of the field.
